title: BRIEF-Oceanagold Says Philippines Court Of Appeals Set 18 Sept As Hearing Date For Injunction
text:
BRIEF-Oceanagold Says Philippines Court Of Appeals Set 18 Sept As Hearing Date For Injunction

Stock Markets 43 minutes ago (Sep 13, 2019 16:50)

BRIEF-Oceanagold Says Philippines Court Of Appeals Set 18 Sept As Hearing Date For Injunction Sept 13 (Reuters) - OceanaGold Corp :

* PHILIPPINES COURT OF APPEALS IN MANILA SET 18 SEPT AS

HEARING

DATE FOR INJUNCTION

* ON DIDIPIO OPERATION, PROCESSING PLANT IS EXPECTED TO

RESUME

OPERATIONS ON SEPT 24

* HEARING DATE REGARDING CO'S APPLICATION FOR INJUNCTION AS

PART

OF ITS APPEAL AGAINST NUEVA VIZCAYA PROVINCIAL COURT RULING



Source text for Eikon: ID:nASXVyFpg

Further company coverage: OGC.AX





BRIEF-Oceanagold Says Philippines Court Of Appeals Set 18 Sept As Hearing Date For Injunction
description: BRIEF-Oceanagold Says Philippines Court Of Appeals Set 18 Sept As Hearing Date For Injunction
